DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility complete nerve-sparing type C1 radical hysterectomy cervical cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Complete Nerve-Sparing Radical Hysterectomy Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate rate postvoid residual urine volume ( PVR ) < 50ml postoperative day 4 patient stage IB1 IIA1 cervix cancer underwent complete nerve-sparing type C1 radical hysterectomy .
DOC.criteria: Age > =18 year < = 70 year . Women histologically confirm , primary adenocarcinoma squamous cell carcinoma uterine cervix . Stage IIA1 , IB1 disease . Karnofsky performance status > 70 . Patients comply followup . With write informed consent . Age > 70 History low urinary tract damage surgery . With abnormal urodynamic study result . Karnofsky performance status < 70 . Patients uncontrolled psychological disorder . Unwilling unable comply protocol . Prior treatment pelvic radiotherapy
